questions.description: Based on the evidence in the graph, which of the following is true?

options.description: People are four times as likely to be involved in a fall than assaulted .
Increased seat belt use would decrease the number of traumatic brain injuries from motor vehicle accidents .
21% of the causes of traumatic brain injury are unknown .
“Other” and “Assault” account for approximately one-third of traumatic brain injuries

questions.detailed_answer: Be sure to read the answer choices carefully. Choices (A), (B), and (C) all make assumptions.

questions.description: The cost difference between four-year public and four-year private institutions was the smallest  during which years?
